EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-10-10 Unlock Cloud Elasticity to Lower Cloud Bills - Live Demo.ES-2018-
EmailTemplate.subject: WEBINAR: How to Unlock Cloud Elasticity to Lower Cloud Bills
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-eq/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Join Eric Wright, Director of Technical Marketing, as he demonstrates how to unlock cloud elasticity and lower cloud bills, tomorrow October 10th at 11 am ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-eq/]]>.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-eq/]]>
In this live 30-minute presentation <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-eq/]]>, you will learn why scaling in the cloud is different than scaling on-premises and see how vertical scaling across AWS or Azure can be automated to unleash true cloud elasticity and save you at least 30% on your monthly cloud bill.
I hope to see you there!
Regards, Megan
PS - If you can't make it tomorrow, please sign up anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-eq/]]>, and I'll send you the recording afterward.
